title: Fashon's Night Out font
content:
Hi!

Can anyone help me identify the font used on the Fashion's Night Out posters?

I thought it was either Futura Black or Bold but I noticed the capital 'A' is different.

Thanks!

Here's the sample:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043959im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fashion-night-out_4313.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fashion-night-out.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043959/http:/typophile.com/files/fashion-night-out_0.png) | 107.05 KB |
author: takk

comments.content: I remember an ID on this exact image awhile back but the search didn't work because the previous post didn't use a descriptive title.
Whoa, after a painful link-by-link search through 200 posts I found the previous thread(s) [Click Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307043959/http:/typophile.com/node/62105).

I did a search as well but, like you, an existing post didn't turn up. Guess because the topic wasn't given a proper title.

Too bad it was never really identified.

Thanks!
how come nobody has solved this?!
